title: Covid travel rules: Portugal removed from UK's green list as seven others join red list
content:
1. Covid travel rules: Portugal removed from UK's green list as seven others join red list  BBC News
  2. 'Safety first': transport secretary on Portugal's removal from travel 'green list'  Guardian News
  3. Holiday chaos as UK removes Portugal from travel green list  Associated Press
  4. COVID-19 UK green list: NO new countries added for safe holidays & Portugal taken OFF  The Sun
  5. No new countries to be added to travel green list, say reports No new countries will  MSN UK
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Covid travel rules: Portugal removed from UK's green list as seven others join red list  BBC News
'Safety first': transport secretary on Portugal's removal from travel 'green list'  Guardian News
Holiday chaos as UK removes Portugal from travel green list  Associated Press
COVID-19 UK green list: NO new countries added for safe holidays & Portugal taken OFF  The Sun

localize.title: コヴィッドのトラベルルール ポルトガルが英国のグリーンリストから除外され、他の7カ国がレッドリストに追加されました。
Covid旅行规则。葡萄牙从英国的绿名单中删除，其他七个国家加入红名单
Covid旅行規則。葡萄牙從英國的綠名單中刪除，其他七個國家加入紅名單
